PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07882010-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations made under the Pension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
PrecisRegulations Amending Certain Regulations made under THE PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS ACT, 1985 by amending the Regulations 1) in respect of funding rules of pension plans to ensure that the rights and interests of pension plan members, retirees and their beneficiaries are protected and 2) to investment rules will provide more flexibility for plans to choose the investment options that best suit their investment needs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0149 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
